home.welcome:
Hi there 
We are a small woolshop from Jordania. You cannot order stuff here, but you an browser our products - let us know about your wishes. 
These are our products:
home.empty: Oops! We haven't yet created our products. Visit us again later.

do-a-wish.title: Do a wish
do-a-wish.description: Let us know about your wishes. Fill in your contact information and send us your wishlist. We will contact you.

no-product-info.title: Missing product information
no-product-info.message: for the given product no product information in this language is present
